column1: # River boundary conditions based on March 2025 field data

# - NO3: 0.11-0.18 mgN/L = 8-13 umol/L (LOW - LOWER than ocean!)
# To get pCO2 ~4000 ppm with AT=1320 umol/L and pH=7.45:
# DIC must be ~1450-1500 umol/L (not too high
